title: Onboarding
description: Set up your profile and get started with your UniMe app.
creator: UniMe

goals.label: Set up your profile
goals.description: Make your UniMe app your own by choosing a profile name and profile picture.

faqs.title: Will this information be shared?
faqs.content: No. Your profile information will never leave your device.

goals.label: Add information about yourself
goals.description: The information you provide does not yet need to be verified by a trusted third party.

faqs.title: What is a credential?
faqs.content: A credential is like a digital proof that verifies something about you, such as your age, education, or memberships.

faqs.title: What does "self-signed" mean?
faqs.content: A self-signed credential is a digital statement you create about yourself, asserting certain information without external verification. It may be less reliable compared to credentials verified by trusted sources. It is like giving yourself a digital thumbs-up.
